meta.description: Global execution contract for Deaconess trauma protocol evaluation
meta.design: Deterministic, fail-closed, evidence-based compliance assessment with full audit trails

semantics.COMPLIANT: All protocol requirements met, full adherence demonstrated
semantics.NON_COMPLIANT: Protocol applies but one or more requirements failed
semantics.NOT_TRIGGERED: Protocol does not apply to this patient (trigger criteria not met)
semantics.INDETERMINATE: Missing required data or timing unclear (fail-closed)

evidence.description: Maximum evidence items to include per requirement evaluation (prevents information overload)

semantics.MANDATORY: Must be met if protocol applies (e.g., trigger criteria, required data elements)
semantics.CONDITIONAL: Only evaluated if applicable (e.g., timing requirements when protocol triggered)

evaluation_order.1_evaluation_mode: Check if protocol is EVALUABLE vs CONTEXT_ONLY

timing.description: Timestamp parsing supports multiple Epic export formats
